resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
liyafan82 commented on pull request #5861: ARROW-7166: [Java] Remove redundant code for Jdbc adapters
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5861
 
 
   As discussed in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5508#issuecomment-543011016, we need a separate issue to extract common logic to a common super class.
   
   This makes the code clearer, and we need to make sure we have no performance regression.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

liyafan82 commented on issue #5861: ARROW-7166: [Java] Remove redundant code for Jdbc adapters
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5861#issuecomment-555439299
 
 
   Benchmark evaluations show no performance degradation:
   
   Before:
   JdbcAdapterBenchmarks.consumeBenchmark      avgt    5   547.267 ±   8.121  us/op
   JdbcAdapterBenchmarks.consumeRowsBenchmark  avgt    5   593.117 ± 109.100  us/op
   JdbcAdapterBenchmarks.testJdbcToArrow       avgt    5  5786.141 ±  68.501  us/op
   
   After: 
   JdbcAdapterBenchmarks.consumeBenchmark      avgt    5   554.501 ±  17.261  us/op
   JdbcAdapterBenchmarks.consumeRowsBenchmark  avgt    5   558.829 ±  22.413  us/op
   JdbcAdapterBenchmarks.testJdbcToArrow       avgt    5  5757.178 ± 197.539  us/op
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

users@infra.apache.org

emkornfield commented on pull request #5861: ARROW-7166: [Java] Remove redundant code for Jdbc adapters
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5861#discussion_r348903196
 
 

 ##########
 File path: java/adapter/jdbc/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/adapter/jdbc/consumer/ArrayConsumer.java
 ##########
 @@ -28,7 +28,7 @@
  * Consumer which consume array type values from {@link ResultSet}.
  * Write the data to {@link org.apache.arrow.vector.complex.ListVector}.
  */
-public abstract class ArrayConsumer implements JdbcConsumer<ListVector> {
+public abstract class ArrayConsumer extends  BaseConsumer<ListVector> {
 
 Review comment:
   spacing looks off

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

fields.description:
As discussed in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5508#issuecomment-543011016, we need a separate issue to extract common logic to a common super class. 

This makes the code clearer, and we need to make sure we have no performance regression.
fields.summary: [Java] Remove redundant code for Jdbc adapters
